Class LibraryFileLoader

java.lang.Object
LibraryFileLoader
public class LibraryFileLoader
extends java.lang.Object
Class responsible for loading book data from file.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description

      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • fileContent

      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileContent
      Contains all lines read from a book data file using the loadFileContent method. This field can be null if loadFileContent was not called for a valid Path yet. NOTE: Individual line entries do not include line breaks at the end of each line.

  • Constructor Details

    • LibraryFileLoader

      public LibraryFileLoader()
      Create a new loader. No file content has been loaded yet.

  • Method Details

    • loadFileContent

      public boolean loadFileContent​(java.nio.file.Path fileName)
      Load all lines from the specified book data file and save them for later parsing with the parseFileContent method. This method has to be called before the parseFileContent method can be executed successfully.
      Parameters:
      fileName - file path with book data
      Returns:
      true if book data could be loaded successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given file name is null

    • contentLoaded

      public boolean contentLoaded()
      Has file content been loaded already?
      Returns:
      true if file content has been loaded already.

    • parseFileContent

      public java.util.List<BookEntry> parseFileContent()
      Parse file content loaded previously with the loadFileContent method.
      Returns:
      books parsed from the previously loaded book data or an empty list if no book data has been loaded yet.

    • addNewBook

      private void addNewBook​(java.lang.String line, java.util.List<BookEntry> books)
